title: Songs of love
creator_credit: Castle Films and United World Films
brief_description: Contains the following love songs: Blue Danube; Romance; Stardust; Two guitars and dark eyes; Love’s own sweet song; Miss you; A nightingale sang in Berkeley Square; It was wonderful then; Isn’t that just like love; It all comes back to me now. Songs performed by The Melody Maids, Gene Grounds and Charles Baron. Recorded by Bobby Sherwood and his Orchestra. Film originally titled “In love with a song”, produced by Cameo Productions in 1941 - director, Roy Mack; producer, Sam Coslow.
